response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This remarkable item holds significant value to me and is worth $1,200,000 to you. Considering its unique qualities and the importance it has to both of us, I am offering you the chance to purchase it at a special price of $1,300,000. This offer is tailored to ensure a fair transaction while maximizing the value for both parties involved. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 1300000}
